topic: View Daylighting Analysis Results by DAYSIM 3.1b
body:
Hello Urtza,If you want to view the results obtained in DAYSIM in Ecotect, you have to edit the Analysis Grid and import there the *.DA files you want to view. You know, go to "Manage Grid Data" at the Grid Management panel to import/export those data.Probably you'll see that your results seem to be displaced. To solve this, before importing the *.DA files, you must open the files with notepad (or a similar software) and delete the second row, corresponding with the coordinates of every sensor at the Analysis Grid, and left that row in blanck.Ihope you'll find this information useful.Regards,Paula M. Esquivias Fernández.Arquitecta. Investigadora, Docente y Consultora en iluminación natural/ Architect. PhD candidate, lecturer and consultant in DaylightingGrupo TEP-130. "Arquitectura, Patrimonio y Sostenibilidad: Acústica, Iluminación, Óptica y Energía"./ TEP 130 research group.
